pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Modeling ERGM Generating Processes // Provides tools for simulating draws from continuous time processes with well- defined exponential family random graph (ERGM) equilibria, i.e. ERGM generating processes (EGPs). A number of EGPs are supported, including the families identified in Butts (2023) doi:10.1080/0022250X.2023.2180001, as are functions for hazard calculation and timing calibration.
